title: Baosu Heti
synopsis: One day, a huge crack suddenly appeared in the midair of the city, followed by mechanical monsters attacking the city. Le Tianxiang, a passionate young man who wanted to become a hero, also unexpectedly partnered with the explosive Mecha Lingkong in this attack, and defeated the enemy with the joint efforts of the two. Since then, mechanical monsters have attacked the city one after another. In the process of fighting against the enemy, Le Tianxiang and Lingkong also met and became acquainted with their friends and partners, including Shi Dagang, a simple and warm boy, Si Xiaosu who is a big ghost, and handsome and elegant Duanmuhai. teammate. Moreover, everyone also discovered some connections between these attackers, and there seems to be a stronger manipulator behind them! Just as everyone was preparing to conduct an in-depth investigation, Le Tianxiang's class came to a mysterious transfer student Fang Fal who also had an explosive mecha partner. Since Fang Falcon joined the team, the enemy’s mechanical monsters always seem to be able to attack everyone’s weaknesses. (translated from iqiyi)
